official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress with respect to the deterioration of conditions in Poland.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Declares that the Congress: (1) condemns the suppression of Solidarity by the Jaruzelski government; and (2) requests the President to consider to vote against Poland's admission to the International Monetary Fund and to encourage other members of the Fund to do the same unless all political prisoners are released and the Polish Government begins a dialogue with the Polish people.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress with respect to the deterioration of conditions in Poland.
